name: The PigeonLand
description:
The PigeonLand is a Beat`Em Up game I made for a college project with other 3 colleagues, I was the main programmer, game designer and also worked on a few songs for the game.

You are Hully, a rabbit who has his home taken by wolves, the pigeons` executives. Hully must now punch his way through wolves, rats and pigeons to solve his problem.
